post_detail.description: C3X was tasked by Fuse to create a toolkit for on and off-air promos for the quarterly ‘Fuse Presents’ concert specials.   Conceived in a darkly lit abstract world, the Presents package shows the explosiveness of Fuse events and literally ties together the music world with a series of audio cables.  This comprehensive show package continued an open, mortise, transitions, backgrounds, and lower thirds.
post_detail.title: FUSE
